titles.title: Directing the Committee on the Budget to hold a public hearing on the President's fiscal year 2017 budget request with the Director of the Office of Management and Budget as a witness.
Directing the Committee on the Budget to hold a public hearing on the President's fiscal year 2017 budget request with the Director of the Office of Management and Budget as a witness.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: Directs the House Budget Committee to hold a public hearing on the President's FY2017 budget request with the Director of the Office of Management and Budget as a witness.
